languages.text: "А с моими людьми, раз они не высокородные, как угодно можно обращаться, да?!" {n}Обернувшийся к вам Малгар рычит, словно зверь.{/n} "Никого я не отпущу! Пусть узнают, каково это — когда тебя бросают подыхать!"

traits.locale_text: "А с моими людьми, раз они не высокородные, как угодно можно обращаться, да?!" {n}Обернувшийся к вам Малгар срывается на крик.{/n} "Не буду я никого отпускать! Пусть узнают, каково это — когда тебя бросают подыхать!"

languages.text: "So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"
languages.original_text: "А с моими людьми, раз они не высокородные, как угодно можно обращаться, да?!" {n}Обернувшийся к вам Малгар рычит, словно зверь.{/n} "Никого я не отпущу! Пусть узнают, каково это — когда тебя бросают подыхать!"

traits.locale_text: "So since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

"So since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

"So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

"So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

"So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

"So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

languages.text: "Da meine Leute also nicht hochwohlgeboren sind, könnt Ihr mit ihnen umspringen, wie Ihr möchtet, ja?" {n}Malgar wendet sich mit einem animalischen Knurren zu dir.{/n} "Ich lasse niemanden gehen! Ich zeige ihnen, wie es ist, wenn man einfach sterbend zurückgelassen wird!"
languages.original_text: "So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

traits.locale_text: "Da meine Leute also nicht hochwohlgeboren sind, könnt Ihr mit ihnen umspringen, wie Ihr möchtet, ja?" {n}Malgar wendet sich mit einem animalischen Knurren zu dir.{/n} "Ich lasse niemanden gehen! Ich zeige ihnen, wie es ist, wenn man einfach sterbend zurückgelassen wird!"

languages.text: « Alors, sous prétexte que mes gars sont pas de haute lignée, on peut les traiter comme des moins que rien, c'est ça ? » {n}Malgar pousse un grognement bestial et se tourne pour vous faire face.{/n} « Personne part ! Je vais leur montrer ce que ça fait, d'être abandonné à son sort ! »
languages.original_text: "So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, sous prétexte que mes gars sont pas de haute lignée, on peut les traiter comme des moins que rien, c'est ça ? » {n}Malgar pousse un grognement bestial et se tourne pour vous faire face.{/n} « Personne part ! Je vais leur montrer ce que ça fait, d'être abandonné à son sort ! »

languages.text: “所以呢？我的手下不是贵族，你们就可以像对待垃圾一样对待他们，对不对？”{n}马尔加转向你，发出了野兽般的咆哮。{/n}“谁都别想走！我要让他们看看，被丢在这里等死是什么滋味！”
languages.original_text: "So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

traits.locale_text: “所以呢？我的手下不是贵族，你们就可以像对待垃圾一样对待他们，对不对？”{n}马尔加转向你，发出了野兽般的咆哮。{/n}“谁都别想走！我要让他们看看，被丢在这里等死是什么滋味！”

languages.text: 「私の仲間はハイボーンではないからどのように扱ってもいいと、そういうことなのですか？」{n}マルガーは獣のごとく唸りながら、あなたに向き直る。{/n}「誰も逃がさん！見殺しにされるとはどんなものか、思い知らせてやる！」
languages.original_text: "So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の仲間はハイボーンではないからどのように扱ってもいいと、そういうことか？」{n}マルガーは獣のごとく唸りながら、あなたに向き直る。{/n}「誰も逃がさん！見殺しにされるとはどんなものか、思い知らせてやる！」

languages.text: «Entonces, como mi gente no es de alta cuna, pueden ser tratados de cualquier forma, ¿no?». {n}Malgar suelta un rugido bestial mientras se gira para mirarte.{/n} «¡No voy a dejar que nadie se vaya! ¡Les enseñaré lo que es que te den por muerto!».
languages.original_text: "So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, como mi gente no es de alta cuna, pueden ser tratados de cualquier forma, ¿no?». {n}Malgar suelta un rugido bestial mientras se gira para mirarte.{/n} «¡No voy a dejar que nadie se vaya! ¡Les enseñaré lo que es que te den por muerto!».

languages.text: "Adamları soylu olmadığından istediğiniz muameleyi çekebilirsiniz yani, öyle mi?" {n}Malgar sana dönerken vahşi bir hırıltı çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kimse bir yere gitmiyor! Ölüme terk edilmek nasıl bir şeymiş, görecekler!"
languages.original_text: "So, since my people aren't highborn, they can be treated however you like, is that it?" {n}Malgar lets out a bestial growl as he turns to face you.{/n} "I'm not letting anyone go! I'll show them what it's like being left for dead!"

traits.locale_text: "Akrabalarım soylu olmadığı için istediğiniz muameleyi çekebilirsiniz yani, öyle mi?" {n}Malgar sana dönerken vahşi bir hırıltı çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kimse bir yere gitmiyor! Onları ölüme terk edilmenin nasıl bir şey olduğunu size göstereceğim!"
